meanings.definition: A woman's suit consisting of a jacket and trousers.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish pantsuit to the business meeting.
meanings.sent2: The pantsuit she wore to the interview was navy blue.
meanings.sent3: The pantsuit she wore to the party made her feel confident and elegant.
meanings.sent4: Her pantsuit was like a professional armor, ready for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pantsuit stood out in the sea of black suits.

meanings.sent1: She will pantsuit for the event tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I pantsuit whenever I have an important meeting.
meanings.sent3: He decided to pantsuit for the job interview to make a good impression.
meanings.sent4: She pantsuited confidently, knowing she looked sharp.
meanings.sent5: They always pantsuit for formal occasions to show professionalism.
